objective_summary: The main research objective of the paper by Cornette de Saint Cyr L et al. (2024) is to investigate the process of methane biohydroxylation into methanol by Methylosinus trichosporium OB3b, focusing on potential limitations and the role of formate in the reaction. The research approach involves studying the biohydroxylation process and identifying factors that may limit its efficiency, as well as examining the role of formate in facilitating the conversion of methane to meth
title: Baldo et al. 2024
